name: Log File Monitoring - Alert on Log Files
short_description:
logXray is a log file monitoring tool that checks and monitors log files for errors or user specified patterns.  It is capable of scanning & analyzing log files via time frames and can be used to graph logs.  logXray is not just any log file monitor.  It does more than just monitor log files.  It can also monitor directories.

The logXray log file monitoring solution was developed over the span of 5 years.  Its sole purpose is to handle all monitoring related to log files and directories.  It monitors, scans, analyzes, alerts and graphs automatically.

When run without arguments, logXray provides users with direct instructions on the different ways to monitor log files.  Additionally, logxray can monitor a log file and alert when an expected pattern is missing from it.

logXray does not require any dependencies or foreign libraries.  Which means, you can use it freely on any UNIX host without having to worry about installing, downloading or performing any complex configurations.
summary: Log File Monitoring, Monitor Application logs / DB logs, Custom logs
